name: ChannelMediaRelayState
description: The state code of the channel media relay.

parameters.Idle: 0: The initial state. After you successfully stop the channel media relay by calling stopChannelMediaRelay, the channelMediaRelayStateChanged callback returns this state.

parameters.Connecting: 1: The SDK tries to relay the media stream to the destination channel.

parameters.Running: 2: The SDK successfully relays the media stream to the destination channel.

parameters.Failure: 3: An error occurs. See code in channelMediaRelayStateChanged for the error code.
